pages.title: Kapok fibre
pages.text: Kapok fibre is used to make wool.Give freedom to your sheep!
Kapok tree, grown from a sapling

Kapok is a giant tropical rainforest tree, a great source of kapok fibre.Kapok, grown from a sapling,is much smaller.Kapok fibre is historically used for making pillows,matrasses etc.Here in Minecraft it is used for crafting wool.
